entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
